InReac: ^Knight: So... We have to find that old temple
^Knight: before they manage to invoke the Lord of Despair
^Mage: Any idea where that might be?
^Druid: There used to be an old cult to him in our homeland
^Druid: The temple is in ruins, but I think they could be in there
^Mage: We studied it some years ago and there certainly was some strange magical energy
^Knight: We don't have much time, but if you both agree I think it's worth to give it a shot
